name: OverHype
description:
Welcome to the future where outdoor fun is outlawed and society relies on content consumption for entertainment. With so many blogs, vlogs, podcasts and livestreams out there, it’s nearly impossible to get noticed. Arm yourself and take it to the corporate goons that caused all this; smash up their police forces and maybe get a few million views while you’re at it.

Controls

Normal first person controls, plus:

  • Jump: Space, A Button
  • Shoot: Left Mouse, Right Trigger
  • Charge: Q, Left Bumper

The menu can only be navigated with the mouse, because game jam

Credits:

Thomas Irvine (https://soundcloud.com/thomasirvine) - Music

Sean Mansell (@arknano) - Game Design, Programming, Sound

Isaac McNicol (https://www.artstation.com/idymc) - 3D Art

Ants Robinson (@ants.robinson) - Concept Art, UI Design

Patrick Webb (@superspry)  - Game & Level Design, Programming
